reviewText: This is a great self defense DVD, I highly recomend it to any one.  You do not need martial arts training, it is so much easier to learn then martial arts, but very effective.

Street Self Defense Vol II is as good if not better then Vol I.  As a Sensei I have incorporated many of the sound principles and effective techniques into my classes. These are "Real World" situations.  An excellent resource for street self defense.

The quality of the Video is outstanding, I really learned a lot.
The techniques here are awesome for today's self-defense. Volume one is great also!!

Street Self Defense 101 Volume II is another great DVD! This is a great compliment to Street Self Defense Volume 1. More real world situations with practical self defense solutions. You don't need to be a black belt for this stuff to work.
